mapper.sql: stature, weight, upperarm_left_normal AS upperarmLeftNormal, upperarm_right_normal AS upperarmRightNormal, upperarm_left_nervous AS upperarmLeftNervous, upperarm_right_nervous AS upperarmRightNervous, forearm_left_normal AS forearmLeftNormal, forearm_right_normal AS forearmRightNormal, forearm_left_nervous AS forearmLeftNervous, forearm_right_nervous AS forearmRightNervous, bust_normal AS bustNormal, bust_nervous AS bustNervous, hipline, waistline, waist_hip_ratio AS waistHipRatio, twelve_run_evaluation AS twelveRunEvaluation, thigh_left_normal AS thighLeftNormal, thigh_right_normal AS thighRightNormal, thigh_left_nervous AS thighLeftNervous, thigh_right_nervous AS thighRightNervous, calf_left_normal AS calfLeftNormal, calf_right_normal AS calfRightNormal, calf_left_nervous AS calfLeftNervous, calf_right_nervous AS calfRightNervous, bodyfat, pulse, blood_pressure AS bloodPressure, maximal_heart_rate AS maximalHeartRate, proper_heart_rate AS properHeartRate, cardiovascular_heart_rate AS cardiovascularHeartRate, resting_heart_rate AS restingHeartRate, dynamic_heart_rate AS dynamicHeartRate, supination_evaluation AS supinationEvaluation, myodynamia_chest AS myodynamiaChest, myodynamia_abdomen AS myodynamiaAbdomen, myodynamia_Back AS myodynamiaBack, body_flexibility AS bodyFlexibility, back_health_assessment AS backHealthAssessment, basal_metabolic_rate AS basalMetabolicRate, BML_index AS bmlIndex, personal_trainer_advice AS personalTrainerAdvice, superior_evaluation AS superiorEvaluation, physical_pic AS physicalPic, evaluation_date AS evaluationDate, personal_id AS personalId, build_date AS buildDate, client_id AS clientId, result, id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fr_client_physical_test where client_id=#{cid} AND build_date=#{date} AND result=0
